## SocketObservable class

Observable that wraps a WebSocketSubject and provides an Observable interface for sending and receiving messages.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SocketObservable<T> extends Observable<T> 
```
**Extends:** Observable&lt;T&gt;

## Remarks

An alias to RxJS Observable.
